metadata.title: CVE-2020-14209 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Dolibarr before 11.0.5 allows low-privilege users to upload files ofdangerous types, leading to arbitrary code execution. This occurs because.pht and .phar files can be uploaded. Also, a .htaccess file can beuploaded to reconfigure access control (e.g., to let .noexe files beexecuted as PHP code to defeat the .noexe protection mechanism).

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
